sn52.11:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anuruddho savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn52.11:1.2: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anuruddhena saddhim …pe… ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu ayasmantam anuruddham etadavocum:
sn52.11:2.1: “Katamesam ayasma anuruddho dhammanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto”ti?
sn52.11:2.2: “Catunnam khvaham, avuso, satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn52.11:2.7: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.11:2.8: imesam khvaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn52.11:2.9: Imesanca panaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta kappasahassam anussarami”ti.
